root.name: Rave Master
root.description: OVERVIEW Rave Master the video game is a fighting game based on the manga and anime, the title of the videogame is Groove Adventure Rave: Fighting Live. Developed by Konami as well as published it was released only on the Nintendo GameCube. Characters Haru Elie Musica Let Shuda Go Rosa Sieg Hart Gale Raregroove King Pasha Reina Outlaw Rear Admiral The Beast King Aniki Poosya
